#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <algorithm>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int n;
	vector<string> r;
	int count_i;
	int count_v;
	int count_x;
	int count_l;
	int count_c;

	r.push_back("i");		r.push_back("ii");		r.push_back("iii");		r.push_back("iv");		r.push_back("v");
	r.push_back("vi");		r.push_back("vii");		r.push_back("viii");	r.push_back("ix");		r.push_back("x");
	
	r.push_back("xi");		r.push_back("xii");		r.push_back("xiii");	r.push_back("xiv");		r.push_back("xv");
	r.push_back("xvi");		r.push_back("xvii");	r.push_back("xviii");	r.push_back("xix");		r.push_back("xx");

	r.push_back("xxi");		r.push_back("xxii");	r.push_back("xxiii");	r.push_back("xxiv");	r.push_back("xxv");
	r.push_back("xxvi");	r.push_back("xxvii");	r.push_back("xxviii");	r.push_back("xxix");	r.push_back("xxx");

	r.push_back("xxxi");	r.push_back("xxxii");	r.push_back("xxxiii");	r.push_back("xxxiv");	r.push_back("xxxv");
	r.push_back("xxxvi");	r.push_back("xxxvii");	r.push_back("xxxviii");	r.push_back("xxxix");	r.push_back("xl");

	r.push_back("xli");		r.push_back("xlii");	r.push_back("xliii");	r.push_back("xliv");	r.push_back("xlv");
	r.push_back("xlvi");	r.push_back("xlvii");	r.push_back("xlviii");	r.push_back("xlix");	r.push_back("xlx");

	r.push_back("li");		r.push_back("lii");		r.push_back("liii");	r.push_back("liv");		r.push_back("lv");
	r.push_back("lvi");		r.push_back("lvii");	r.push_back("lviii");	r.push_back("lix");		r.push_back("lx");

	r.push_back("lxi");		r.push_back("lxii");	r.push_back("lxiii");	r.push_back("lxiv");	r.push_back("lxv");
	r.push_back("lxvi");	r.push_back("lxvii");	r.push_back("lxviii");	r.push_back("lxix");	r.push_back("lxx");

	r.push_back("lxxi");	r.push_back("lxxii");	r.push_back("lxxiii");	r.push_back("lxxiv");	r.push_back("lxxv");
	r.push_back("lxxvi");	r.push_back("lxxvii");	r.push_back("lxxviii");	r.push_back("lxxix");	r.push_back("lxxx");

	r.push_back("lxxxi");	r.push_back("lxxxii");	r.push_back("lxxxiii");	r.push_back("lxxxiv");	r.push_back("lxxxv");
	r.push_back("lxxxvi");	r.push_back("lxxxvii");	r.push_back("lxxxviii");r.push_back("lxxxix");	r.push_back("xc");

	r.push_back("xci");		r.push_back("xcii");	r.push_back("xciii");	r.push_back("xciv");	r.push_back("xcv");
	r.push_back("xcvi");	r.push_back("xcvii");	r.push_back("xcviii");	r.push_back("ic");	r.push_back("c");

	while (scanf("%d", &n) && (n != 0))
	{
		count_i = 0;
		count_v = 0;
		count_x = 0;
		count_l = 0;
		count_c = 0;

		for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
		{
			count_i += count(r.at(i).begin(), r.at(i).end(), 'i');
			count_v += count(r.at(i).begin(), r.at(i).end(), 'v');
			count_x += count(r.at(i).begin(), r.at(i).end(), 'x');
			count_l += count(r.at(i).begin(), r.at(i).end(), 'l');
			count_c += count(r.at(i).begin(), r.at(i).end(), 'c');
		}

		printf("%d ", count_i);
		printf("%d ", count_v);
		printf("%d ", count_x);
		printf("%d ", count_l);
		printf("%d\n", count_c);
	}
}
